templeInfo.name: Ganapathi Temple
templeInfo.tagline: Experience divine blessings through sacred rituals and ceremonies
templeInfo.description: Remove obstacles and invite prosperity into your life.

activities.name: Ganapathi Homam (గణపతి హోమము)
activities.description: Sacred fire ritual to invoke Lord Ganapathi's blessings
activities.fullDescription: Ganapathi Homam is a powerful Vedic fire ritual performed to remove obstacles and bring prosperity. This sacred ceremony involves chanting of mantras and offerings to the holy fire.

activities.name: Abhishekam (అభిషేకం)
activities.description: Holy bathing ceremony of Lord Ganapathi
activities.fullDescription: Abhishekam is the ceremonial bathing of the deity with various sacred substances like milk, honey, curd, and holy water.

activities.name: Modaka Homam (మోడక హోమము)
activities.fullDescription: Modaka Homam is a sacred fire ritual offering Modakas, the favorite sweet of Lord Ganapathi, seeking prosperity and happiness.

activities.name: Sampoorna Pooja (సంపూర్ణ పూజ)
activities.fullDescription: Sampoorna Pooja includes all major rituals performed with full devotion for complete blessings of Lord Ganapathi.

activities.name: Sahasranama Archana (సహస్రనామ అర్చన)
activities.description: Chanting of 1000 names of Lord Ganapathi
activities.fullDescription: Sahasranama Archana involves chanting of 1000 sacred names of Lord Ganapathi for seeking blessings and removing obstacles.

rooms.name: Deluxe AC Room
rooms.description: Comfortable AC room with all modern amenities

rooms.name: Standard AC Room
rooms.description: Standard AC room with basic amenities

rooms.name: Non-AC Room
rooms.description: Simple non-AC room for budget stay

ganapathis32.name: Bala Ganapathi
ganapathis32.fullDescription: Bala Ganapathi is depicted as a child form of Lord Ganesha, representing purity, innocence, and the beginning of all things.

ganapathis32.name: Taruna Ganapathi
ganapathis32.description: The youthful form of Lord Ganesha
ganapathis32.fullDescription: Taruna Ganapathi represents the youthful energy and vigor of Lord Ganesha, symbolizing growth and development.

ganapathis32.name: Bhakti Ganapathi
ganapathis32.fullDescription: Bhakti Ganapathi is the form that inspires devotion and represents the path of devotion to reach the divine.

ganapathis32.name: Vira Ganapathi
ganapathis32.fullDescription: Vira Ganapathi is the warrior form of Lord Ganesha, representing courage, strength, and protection from evil forces.

ganapathis32.name: Shakti Ganapathi
ganapathis32.description: The powerful form with divine energy
ganapathis32.fullDescription: Shakti Ganapathi represents the divine energy and power that creates, sustains, and transforms the universe.

ganapathis32.name: Dvija Ganapathi
ganapathis32.fullDescription: Dvija Ganapathi represents wisdom, knowledge, and spiritual rebirth through learning and self-realization.

ganapathis32.name: Siddhi Ganapathi
ganapathis32.fullDescription: Siddhi Ganapathi grants spiritual accomplishments and success in all endeavors to sincere devotees.

ganapathis32.name: Ucchishita Ganapathi
ganapathis32.fullDescription: Ucchishita Ganapathi represents supreme bliss, contentment, and the state of ultimate satisfaction.

blogPosts.title: Understanding the 32 Forms of Lord Ganapathi
blogPosts.excerpt: Explore the divine manifestations of Lord Ganesha in his 32 unique forms.

blogPosts.title: The Power of Vedic Rituals in Modern Life
blogPosts.excerpt: Learn how ancient Vedic rituals remain relevant today.
